name: CMD: Overdrive, Corporate Takedown
description:
CMD: Overdrive is an asymmetrical hybrid game for 3-5 players, combining physical and digital aspects. 2-4 players play as hackers infiltrating an office complex trying to get into the CEO’s office to steal incriminating data from the CEO's computer to leak to the press. 1 player plays as the Corporation’s security officer who tries to catch the hackers using security guards and various security systems. The hackers win if they manage to hack the CEOs computer and escape while the Corporation wins when they catch all the hackers. 

The game utilizes an app that you need to play the game. All of the public information is displayed on the physical game board while secret information is shown in the app.

NOTE! You will need the physical game in order to play this game! An Print-to-play version is coming in the future
